title: Competitive Gold-Plat Team Looking For Jungle!
body:
We are a new LATE NIGHT team looking to fill out our roster (7pm PST-12am PST are rough times for practices). We are looking to play most nights consistently and look scrim and compete in various tournaments. We are looking for players in gold/plat to apply but will consider impressive players of any rank. Do NOT add me in game before posting, once you've posted here feel free to add me in-game at: IamBattleField or our team captain in-game at LordPulk

Current Roster:
Top: Wimbels
Jungle: TBA
Mid: Astrid Zexis
ADC: IamBattleField
Support: LordPulk

Must Haves:
1. A working microphone
2. A fluency in English
3. Discord
4. Be 17+ years old
5. Gold IV+ in Flex 5v5 is a huge bonus!
5. Availability evenings from 7pm+ PST most days
6. A sense of humor...although this is a competitive team that does not mean we don't know how to have a good time.

What We Expect:
- A confident player that understands and mains 1 role.
- A consistent schedule (if your schedule varies from week to week, please consider this before applying)
- Maturity and the ability to relax and take things serious when it comes time to play.

Application Form (copy and paste this into your post):
-- Summoner Name:
-- Current rank/elo:
-- Age:
-- times available:
-- Role applying for:
-- Top 5 champs in role:
-- Playstyle:
-- Past experience with teams:
-- Why are you interested in us:
